item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Asea Brown Boveri Logo
ABB, formerly ASEA Brown Boveri, is a Swedish-Swiss multinational corporation headquartered in Z端rich, Switzerland, operating mainly in robotics, power, heavy electrical equipment, and automation technology areas. It is ranked 341st in the Fortune Global 500 list of 2018 and has been a global Fortune 500 company for 24 years. Until the sale of its electricity division in 2020, ABB was Switzerland’s largest industrial employer. ABB is traded on the SIX Swiss Exchange in Z端rich, Nasdaq Stockholm and the New York Stock Exchange in the United States.
You can download theABBlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: ABB
item.description: ABB, formerly ASEA Brown Boveri, is a Swedish-Swiss multinational corporation headquartered in Z端rich, Switzerland, operating mainly in robotics, power, heavy electrical equipment, and automation technology areas. It is ranked 341st in the Fortune Global 500 list of 2018 and has been a global Fortune 500 company for 24 years. Until the sale of its electricity division in 2020, ABB was Switzerland’s largest industrial employer. ABB is traded on the SIX Swiss Exchange in Z端rich, Nasdaq Stockholm and the New York Stock Exchange in the United States.
